title: Broken Store
body: For the past two days every time I have tried to access the store all I get is a black background and bold, white writing saying "The Store is currently unavailable, we will be back shortly". I have logged in on other accounts on my computer and the store has worked fine. My friend has logged into my account on their computer and the store doesn't work. It is not my computer that is the problem, it is my account specifically. I have never had this problem before. PLEASE HELP ASAP

replies.body: This issue is currently being faced by many players and Riot are working on a fix in the NA region.
me and my brother have same problem as well yet our friends can use the store
